title: 单机移植到服务器发生的MOD冲突问题
author: Kavintion
txt_content:
如题，我在单机的客户端里面创造了一个很重要的存档，然后在服务端的日志里说明本存档被某些单机特有的（优化之类的，比如R键整理，小地图）Mod修改过，服务器无法读取，这时候有什么办法能够挽救呢，在线等，急需啊
服务器信息：MCPC+1.7.10 Java8

后台日志（顺序由新到旧从上到下）:
 
 27.01 21:51:09 [Multicraft] Skipped 4 lines due to rate limit (30/s)
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] INFO craftguide:craftguide_item
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] INFO Missing Blocks/Items:
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] INFO A world backup will be automatically created in your saves directory.
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] INFO If you continue the missing blocks/items will get removed.
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] WARN Forge Mod Loader detected missing blocks/items.
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR Unidentified item: craftguide:craftguide_item, id 5256
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] INFO Found a missing id from the world craftguide:craftguide_item
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] INFO Injecting existing block and item data into this server instance
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod WailaHarvestability which appears to be missing, things may not work well
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod UnicodeFontFixer which appears to be missing, things may not work well
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod ArmorStatusHUD which appears to be missing, things may not work well
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod Waila which appears to be missing, things may not work well
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod voxelmap which appears to be missing, things may not work well
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod AntiCheat3 which appears to be missing, things may not work well
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod ChunkAnimator which appears to be missing, things may not work well
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod DamageIndicatorsMod which appears to be missing, things may not work well
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod inventorytweaks which appears to be missing, things may not work well
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod craftguide which appears to be missing, things may not work well
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod worldedit which appears to be missing, things may not work well
27.01 21:51:09 [Server] ERROR This world was saved with mod CodeChickenCore which appears to be missing, things may not work well

27.01 21:51:09 [Server] INFO This world was saved with mod Forge version 10.13.2.1230 and it is now at version 10.13.3.1388, things may not work well

replies.txt_content:
R键整理，小地图等客户端MOD在服务端中不能加载
会导致服务端运行不了或者崩服
请注意区分客户端MOD与服务端MOD的区别
客户端MOD只需要在客户端安装即可使用，可随意更改
服务端MOD必须要与客户端MOD一致，玩家才可以用客户端连接进服务器
就是说客户端又的MOD 服务端不一定需要有
但是服务端有的MOD 客户端必须要有

replies.author: Kavintion
replies.txt_content:
1208341968 发表于 2018-1-27 22:00
R键整理，小地图等客户端MOD在服务端中不能加载
会导致服务端运行不了或者崩服
请注意区分客户端MOD与服务 ...
最佳答案的话说的是原因，然后其实后台提示了我输入/fml confirm就可以继续加载，然后现在没什么问题了，但是还是设置了最佳答案，原因是说出了冲突的原因，二是有一颗热心回答的心~感谢咯
